message: My turn! Let's split it evenly and avoid wasting time.
Meet me in the middle of our two previous offers.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. We both lose if we don't agree.  Let's be fair and split it 50/50.
Getting closer to what I think is fair.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm meeting you closer to your offer.  Take it or leave it - we're running out of time.
I'll give you one more chance, Bob. Take it or we'll both lose!
Okay, Alice, last chance.  This is as close to a 50/50 split as it's going to get.  We both lose if you reject!
